content.description: Jump start to the nice jug and head up the face. Other boulders are off.Problem #245 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P3.
content.location: Far right end of north face above the tunnel.

content.description: Just right of the awesome huge foothold (on), start with obvious positive-but-sharp 4-finger edge in the middle of face, and an edge down left of it. A couple long moves will reach nice pockets/dishes at the lip before topping out.Problem #244 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P3.
content.protection: Room for a pad, but careful of the small steps/drops behind the problem.
content.location: North face just right of the large shelf foothold.

content.description: Just below the lip of the boulder are some small but positive edges to start with. Head up for an interesting top out.Problem #243 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P2.
content.protection: Room for a pad, but careful of the small steps/drops behind the problem.
content.location: Center of north face, just right of the dark bit that touches the ground.

content.description: Left end of north face, start on nice head height edges and head up. Boulder to the left is off.Problem #242 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
content.location: Left side of north face, just left of the dark bit that touches the ground.

content.description: Hanging from the obvious good pocket on right side of face with right hand, left down lower, climb straight up.Problem #240 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P2.
content.location: On right side of south face, scramble around or use the tunnel.

content.description: A single boulder with a number of problems on it, good on warmer days due to plenty of shade options when resting.
